```{r setup}
library(CourseRec)
```

The 'CourseRec' package provides users with the ability to input 3 courses which they want to take and will return courses from the Smith College catalog ('https://www.smith.edu/apps/course_search/') which are available based on different optional criteria. It includes a dataset which provides information about all course offerings, the instructors, departments, descriptions, and other relevant details.
